alternatives.title: Perlan Museum
alternatives.description: Interactive science museum with exhibitions on Icelandic nature, including a man-made ice cave and planetarium show. Allow 1.5-2 hours for a complete visit.

tip: The Blue Lagoon is less crowded in the morning and late evening. If you arrive early, you'll have more space to enjoy the experience before the midday rush.
notes: Today is focused on relaxation after your flight, with minimal physical activity.
The Blue Lagoon is the perfect antidote to jet lag and will set the tone for your Iceland adventure.
Remember to pack your swimwear in your carry-on so you can head straight to the Blue Lagoon from the airport.
